name: Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire Exterior
author: Jasper Speelman
description:
These
 are all the unique colors used for exterior tilesets in the GameBoy 
Advance games Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire.  I collected every color
 found in the .pal files in the "General"  folder of pokeruby, the 
disassembly project for Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire, converted all the 
RGB values to HEX, removed any duplicate color shared between palettes 
and tried to order them as logically as I could. The original palettes 
can be found here: 
https://github.com/pret/pokeruby/tree/master/data/tilesets/primary/
general/palettes
